H0.text: What Scottish city is at the confluence of the rivers Dee and Don. Dundee

H1.text: What Scottish city is at the confluence of the rivers Dee and Don. Inverness

H2.text: What Scottish city is at the confluence of the rivers Dee and Don. Perth

H3.text: What Scottish city is at the confluence of the rivers Dee and Don. ABERDEEN

A4.text: The area around Aberdeen is thought to have been settled for at least 6,000 years, based upon the discovery of prehistoric villages around the mouths of the rivers Dee and Don.
